	<h2 class="entry-title">	<a href="http://keepingscore.blogs.time.com/2012/10/22/uci-agrees-to-strip-armstrong-of-his-7-tour-titles/" title="Permalink to UCI Agrees to Strip Armstrong of His 7 Tour Titles" rel="bookmark">UCI Agrees to Strip Armstrong of His 7 Tour Titles</a>
	</h2>
	
	<div class="entry-meta">
		<span class="entry-byline">By <a href="http://keepingscore.blogs.time.com/author/timeassociatedpress/" title="Posts by Associated Press" rel="author">Associated Press</a></span><span class="entry-date">33 mins ago</span><span class="entry-comments"><a href="http://keepingscore.blogs.time.com/2012/10/22/uci-agrees-to-strip-armstrong-of-his-7-tour-titles/#comments"><span data-lf-article-id="2342307" data-lf-site-id="314110" class="livefyre-commentcount">0</span></a></span>	</div>
	
</header>
	
	<div class="entry-content group">
		<p>(GENEVA) &#8212; Cycling&#8217;s governing body has agreed to strip Lance Armstrong of his seven Tour de France titles and ban him for life.</p>
<p>UCI President Pat McQuaid announced Monday that the federation accepted the U.S. Anti-Doping &hellip;</p>
<div id="jp-post-flair" class="sharedaddy sd-sharing-enabled"></div>	</div>
	
</article>					<article id="post-2342284" class="post-2342284 post type-post status-publish hentry category-football format-article has-thumbnail has-badge position-right">
	
	<header class="entry-header">

			google_max_num_ads = 3;
			google_ad_type = 'text';

			var google_ad_request_done = function( google_ads ) {
	
				var s = '';
				
				if( google_ads.length < 1 ) return;
				google_last_ad_type = google_ads[0].type;
			
				for( var i = 0; i < google_ads.length; i++ ) {
					if( ( i + 1 ) == google_ads.length ) {
						s += '<p style="margin-bottom:0;">'
					} else {
						s += '<p>'
					}
					s += '<a class="ad-title" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '">' + google_ads[i].line1 + '</a><br/>';
					s += '<span class="ad-desc">';
			        s += google_ads[i].line2 + ' ' + google_ads[i].line3 + '<br/>';
			        s += '</span>';
			        s += '<a class="ad-url" href="' + google_ads[i].url + '">' + google_ads[i].visible_url + '</a>';
			        s += '</p>';
				}
				
				document.write('<div class="google-ad module sponsored-links mobile-right"><span class="sponsored"><a href="' + google_info.feedback_url + '">Sponsored Links</a></span>' + s + '</div>');
				
				return;
			}
